meals.name: Spaghetti Bolognese
meals.instructions: Boil spaghetti until al dente. Fry minced beef with onions and garlic, add tomato sauce and simmer. Serve hot.

meals.name: Vegetable Stir Fry
meals.instructions: Heat oil in a pan, stir fry vegetables, add noodles, pour soy sauce, and toss until well coated.

meals.name: Chicken Salad
meals.instructions: Grill chicken, chop vegetables, mix together with olive oil dressing, serve chilled.

meals.name: Beef Tacos
meals.instructions: Cook ground beef with taco seasoning. Fill shells with beef, lettuce, cheese, and top with salsa.

meals.name: Pancakes
meals.instructions: Mix batter, heat a pan with butter, pour batter and cook until golden brown on both sides.

meals.name: Grilled Cheese Sandwich
meals.instructions: Butter the bread, place cheese between slices, grill until golden and cheese is melted.

meals.name: Vegetable Soup
meals.instructions: Chop vegetables, boil in broth until tender. Add seasoning to taste and serve hot.

meals.name: Omelette
meals.instructions: Whisk eggs, pour into heated pan, add vegetables, cook until set, fold and serve.

meals.name: Fried Rice
meals.instructions: Stir fry vegetables, add rice and soy sauce, toss together with scrambled eggs.

meals.name: Fruit Smoothie
meals.instructions: Blend all ingredients until smooth, serve cold.
